text: She didn't win for The Sinner but it looks like Jessica Biel won something else instead : loads of affection from her husband Justin Timberlake. When backstage at the Emmy Awards at LA's Microsoft Theater on Monday, the beauty was showered with kisses by the Suit And Tie crooner. And the blonde mother - of - one also returned the love as she smooched on her husband too. Scroll down for list of winners...
